CustomField.inlineHelpText:
This section should be used to outline the review of and subsequent recommendations for clients' existing investments.
You should also confirm: penalties or guarantees, ongoing contributions, CGT calculations, total charges vs NOVA, can adviser charging be added, investment options, current equity content e.g. c90%, costs to sell funds/transfer, other factors. Include EIS/VCT & direct shares (RSUs etc).
CustomField.label: Investment Review Advice
